xwikidoc.title: SQL Tools
xwikidoc.content: = SQL Tools = {{warning}}You need the programming rights to use these scripts. They can be very dangerous, since you can change everything in the wiki database. So, take care!{{/warning}} * [[SQL Query on XWiki Database>>QueryOnXWiki]] * [[SQL Query on JDBC Database>>Query]] * [[List tables of XWiki Database>>ListTablesOfXWiki]] * [[List tables of JDBC Database>>ListTables]]
